channel.title: rehab
channel.description: blargle zorp fizzle bing bong sploosh
channel.itunes:author: goblin

item.title: rehab part 1
item.description: 1985 phil donahue show where medellin cartel smuggler swallowed 88 cocaine condoms, burst mid-interview, triggered first live tv overdose ever broadcast
item.itunes:title: rehab part 1

item.title: rehab part 2
item.description: philip seymour hoffman snorted 70 heroin bags in 24hrs before death—dealers mourned him as best customer, left $35k cash in his apartment
item.itunes:title: rehab part 2

item.title: rehab part 3
item.description: grateful dead's jerry garcia introduced wall street to heroin—1980s brokers smoked $1000/day china white between merger calls
item.itunes:title: rehab part 3

item.title: rehab part 4
item.description: belushi died from "speedball"—cocaine + heroin mix. his dealer william smith did 15 years, emerged clean, now runs sobriety podcast
item.itunes:title: rehab part 4

item.title: rehab part 5
item.description: 90% of fentanyl now made in chinese chem labs, not mexico—single kilo yields 1 million lethal doses, sells for $30k on dark web
item.itunes:title: rehab part 5

item.title: rehab part 6
item.description: river phoenix od'd outside viper room on heroin + cocaine + valium + marijuana cocktail. fergie was there, tried cpr 20 minutes
item.itunes:title: rehab part 6

item.title: rehab part 7
item.description: chris farley died with cocaine, weed, 4x morphine levels. his heroin spoon + lighter found untouched beside body, like final still life
item.itunes:title: rehab part 7

item.title: rehab part 8
item.description: layne staley ate 3 grams heroin day before death—autopsy found teeth rotted through from neglect, spoon fused to floor from residue
item.itunes:title: rehab part 8

item.title: rehab part 9
item.description: mac miller died from fentanyl-laced cocaine he thought was pure. dealer "stephen walter" faces life—ran operation from prison smuggled via lawyers
item.itunes:title: rehab part 9

item.title: rehab part 10
item.description: judd from siesta key snorted 50 oxy pills day at peak—dealers delivered to his boat during filming, hid baggies in life jackets
item.itunes:title: rehab part 10

item.title: rehab part 11
item.description: heroin cuts 80% levamisole—vet dewormer destroys human immune systems. 2010 nyc outbreak left 70% users with necrotic flesh falling off faces
item.itunes:title: rehab part 11

item.title: rehab part 12
item.description: prince died from fentanyl patch diversion—patients sell 100mcg/hr patches for $50/street, equivalent 10mg pure heroin dose per patch
item.itunes:title: rehab part 12

item.title: rehab part 13
item.description: hunter s thompson shot nurse's heart full speedball during "fear loathing" research—claimed it "activated her pineal gland" before she flatlined
item.itunes:title: rehab part 13
